actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of citizenship and ethics.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a program of grants to instruct public elementary and secondary school students in the principles of citizenship and ethics. Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1979-1981 for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of citizenship and ethics.
